name: CHAOKE Exercise Bike, Quiet Adjustable Magnetic Stationary Bike for Home Cardio with App Compatible, 350LB Weight Capacity Indoor Cycling Bike with Large Seat, Dumbbell Rack, Pull Cords & LCD Display
short_description: [CHAOKE 6-in-1 Exercise Equipment]: This home exercise bike offers 100% micro-adjustable resistance, giving you a wide range of intensity options. Whether you're a fitness enthusiast or a beginner, this bike meets all your needs. It supports warm-up rides, seated rides, standing rides, dumbbell seated rides, and includes arm resistance bands (which can be attached to the front or rear of the bike) to help you can perform full-body aerobic and high-intensity training while riding

[2026 Upgraded PRO Exercise Bike - Smart App Compatible]: The CHAOKE exercise bikes is seamlessly compatible with popular fitness apps like Z-sport, Zwift, and Kinomap. You can compete on global routes (Kinomap offers over 1,000 real tracks) or join live races on Zwift—turning solo workouts into social fitness experiences. Enjoy real-time tracking, virtual riding routes, and personalized training plans—all accessible from your tablet or smartphone

[Stable and Safe Structure]: This stationary bikes for home features a double triangle structure, an ergonomically designed handlebar, a 35lb heavy-duty flywheel, an arched rear frame tube, and 5 anti-slip pads at the base to ensure maximum riding stability. Made of 2.00 mm thick steel, it offers long-lasting durability and a smooth surface. The electrophoretic anti-rust coating keeps it looking new for years! With a maximum weight capacity of 350 lbs, your workouts are safer and more reliable

[Magnetic Resistance & Quiet Design]: Unlike traditional friction bikes that squeak over time and wear out, our magnetic resistance indoor cycling bike delivers a quiet riding experience—perfect for home use without disturbing others. The high-density rubber belt drive ensures smooth pedaling, reduces joint pressure, and eliminates the clunky feel of chain-driven bikes. No maintenance, no lubrication, just hassle-free workouts

[Unmatched Comfort & Flexibility for All Users]: The spin bikes for home is equipped with a 4-way adjustable seat (forward/backward and up/down) and a 2-way adjustable handlebar (up/down) to suit users of different heights and body types. Suitable for users from 4'8" to 6'4" tall. The enlarged, high-resilience, soft road-bike-style seat ensures long rides remain comfortable. CHAOKE workout bike designed for everyone in the family to enjoy a truly luxurious workout experience

[LCD Display & Tablet Holder]: The stationary bike comes with a multi-functional LCD screen that displays key workout data including time, speed, distance, odometer, and calories burned—helping you track your progress in real time for more effective workouts. Whether you're watching videos, listening to music, or joining online fitness classes, the built-in tablet holder offers a secure and convenient space for your device

[User-Focused Design Details]: This indoor bike trainer comes with a unique dumbbell rack for convenient storage (Note: dumbbells not included). The water bottle holder has been upgraded from 1 to 2, allowing you to store bottles, towels, or mobile phones etc. Attach the 2pcs arm resistance bands to the bike for simultaneous arm training while cycling. Quality you can trust —Every detail of our exercise bikes!

[Quick Assembly, Transport Wheels, and Compact Size]: The fitness equipment comes 80% pre-assembled and includes a detailed manual, video guide, and full toolkit, allowing you to complete assembly in just 25–30 minutes. The built-in transport wheels allow you to push the gym bike wherever you want to ride it, even if it's moving from indoors to outdoors. It also doesn't take up much space in the corner of your home when it's idle

[CHAOKE - We Value You! ]: With our 1-year warranty, enjoy total peace of mind. At CHAOKE, we actively listen to your feedback and continuously refine our exercise bike to meet your needs. Need assistance? Our expert engineers are ready to provide personalized video guidance, and we guarantee a response within 18 hours. your satisfaction is our priority!

We’re here to make your fitness journey smooth from day one.
